messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is unique about how mi-go communicate with each other?
They communicate by changing the colors of their brain-like heads.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why can't mi-go eat terrene food?
They are unable to eat terrene food, and instead import it from other worlds.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do mi-go fly through space?
They fly through the interstellar aether on their great wings.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is unusual about the frequencies of the mi-go's bodies?
Their bodies resonate at unusual frequencies, possibly making them pan-dimensional beings.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is unique about the mi-go's bodies?
Their bodies seem to resonate at unusual frequencies.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the mi-go's body after death?
It dissolves into a pool of translucent goo within a few hours.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why can ordinary photographic plates not capture the mi-go?
Ordinary photographic plates will not take an image of the mi-go.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the mi-go's goo after it dries out?
It leaves only an oily stain.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a mi-go after death?
It dissolves into a pool of translucent goo within a few hours.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What do mi-go worship, alongside Nyarlathotep and Shub-Niggurath?
They worship both Nyarlathotep and Shub-Niggurath, and possibly others.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the source of the Abominable Snowman stories?
Occasional sightings in remote places have become the source of the Abominable Snowman stories.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a mi-go when it's injured?
It can regrow or attach new limbs as needed.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What do the Mi-go hire or compel human agents to do?
simplify and front their operations on Earth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can the Mi-go attach to life-sustaining metal tubes containing human brains?
speaking, listening, and seeing devices
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can humans do to interact with the mi-go's contained brains?
Attach speaking, listening, and seeing devices to the tubes.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What effect does introducing ultra-high and ultra-low frequency tones have on humans?
Put humans into a trance state.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How far must humans be from a mi-go to resist its telepathic communication?
Within forty-feet.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much magic point does it cost for a human to communicate telepathically with a mi-go?
1 magic point per 5 rounds.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a human is within 40 feet of a mi-go?
The human must succeed in an opposed POW roll or become incapable of action.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much magic point does the mi-go spend for every cubic yard of blackness desired?
1 magic point
